pageContext.course_type_long_description: Build a foundation for engineering with LEGO速 Duplo速! Create Airplanes, Drawbridges, Seesaws, Windmills, Cranes, and other fun projects in this class for pre-K builders only. Parents are welcome to join the fun as young builders learn about  shapes, colors, patterns, and counting while playing with their creations.
pageContext.course_type_name: Build It! using LEGO速 Duplo速
pageContext.action_url_comment: Students who sign up for this class must register for the entire day of programming through International School of Denver.  Click link or call (303) 340-3647
